prompt: Generate a single, high-quality, realistic footstep sound of a human walking on asphalt. The sound should be clean, natural, and balanced, with a subtle texture (e.g., heel impact, light toe lift). Ensure it is loop-friendly—smooth attack and decay without abrupt cuts—so it can be seamlessly repeated in code. Deliver in stereo WAV format (44.1kHz, 16-bit). Avoid background noise or reverb (dry sound only)
